articles.author: Ramy  Inocencio, Duarte  Dias
articles.title: Lisbon funicular crash victims' nationalities slowly emerge after Portugal streetcar disaster that killed 16 - CBS News
articles.description: At least one American was among the 16 people killed in a devastating electric streetcar crash in Portugal's capital, along with many other foreign nationals.
articles.content: Lisbon — Two days after Portugal's worst-ever electric streetcar crash killed 16 people and left more than 20 others from across the globe injured, forensics teams in Lisbon said Friday that they had… [+5806 chars]
